sentences.en: Come into the office.
sentences.cn: 到办公室里来。

sentences.en: He closed down the business and went into politics.
sentences.cn: 他关闭公司投身政治。

sentences.en: He thrust his hand into his coat pocket.
sentences.cn: 他把手插进大衣口袋里。

sentences.en: He was often caustic and mocking, or flew into rages.
sentences.cn: 他常常讽刺或挖苦人，有时又会大发雷霆。

sentences.en: I have tried to pack a good deal into a few words.
sentences.cn: 我尽量言简意赅。

sentences.en: I took the phone, and she went discreetly into the living room.
sentences.cn: 我拿起了电话，她知趣地进了客厅。

sentences.en: I’ve got to go into town this morning.
sentences.cn: 我今天上午得进城去。

sentences.en: If you build more plastics into cars, the car lasts longer.
sentences.cn: 如果汽车采用更多塑料元件，寿命会更长一些。

sentences.en: Jovial ladies chivvy you into ordering more than you can eat!
sentences.cn: 热情的女招待会一再推荐，最后点的餐多到吃不下!

sentences.en: Llewelyn was mounting the stairs up into the keep.
sentences.cn: 卢埃林登上台阶，走进城堡主楼。

sentences.en: She reached into the wardrobe and extracted another tracksuit.
sentences.cn: 她伸手又从衣橱里取出一件运动服。

sentences.en: Sue got back into bed and pulled the quilt over her head.
sentences.cn: 休回到床上，拉过被子蒙住头。

sentences.en: The brothers usually roll into their studio around midday.
sentences.cn: 兄弟几个总是要到正午前后才姗姗来到工作室。

sentences.en: The bus is said to have over-turned and fallen into a ravine.
sentences.cn: 据说巴士发生翻车，跌进了峡谷。

sentences.en: The light went out, and the room was plunged into darkness.
sentences.cn: 灯熄了，屋里陷入一片漆黑。

sentences.en: The recent rain had churned up the waterfall into a muddy whirlpool.
sentences.cn: 最近的一场雨把瀑布搅成了泥水漩涡。

sentences.en: There must be another way into the cave.
sentences.cn: 一定有其他的路可以进入洞穴。

sentences.en: They identified six plants as having potential for development into pharmaceutical drugs.
sentences.cn: 他们验明6种植物有可能提炼出药物麻醉剂。

sentences.en: We dived into the sea.
sentences.cn: 我们跳进海里。

sentences.en: We're taking relatively benign medicines and we're turning them into poisons.
sentences.cn: 我们服的药相对来说药性温和，但是我们却在把它们变成毒药。

sentences.en: You have to take capital appreciation of the property into account.
sentences.cn: 你必须将该处房产的资本增值考虑在内。

trans.tran_cn: 进入，到…里面，朝，向，撞上，碰上，到（一段时间的某一点），成为，关于，涉及
trans.tran_en: to the inside or inner part of a container, place, area etc
